snippet.title: Surf World Series Announcement Trailer - Vision Games
snippet.description:
Official launch trailer for Surf World Series from Climax Studios. Grab your board and rack up the high score at 5 of the world's most iconic surfing destinations. 

Grab your board and take to the waves in Surf World Series. Take on 45 single player challenges or carve up the competition online against up to 15 other players across 5 different game modes on your quest to become a surf legend.

www.surfworldseries.com

© 2016 Vision Games Publishing. © Standfast Interactive. All rights reserved
